thread.title: Violence in Kashmir leaves at least 20 dead in a day

title: Violence in Kashmir leaves at least 20 dead in a day
text:
Violence in Kashmir leaves at least 20 dead in a day 2:34pm IST - 01:19 
Three people are killed as police crack down on a massive protest in Kashmir. Hundreds of people had flooded villages in protest after an earlier clash between militants and security forces that killed another 17 people. Ryan Brooks   
Three people are killed as police crack down on a massive protest in Kashmir. Hundreds of people had flooded villages in protest after an earlier clash between militants and security forces that killed another 17 people. Ryan Brooks  //reut.rs/2J9jpdE
